summary: Paulie, a talking parrot, recounts his travels looking for his original owner to a Russian janitor who helps him to the end of his journey.
cast: Gena Rowlands|Tony Shalhoub|Cheech Marin|Bruce Davison|Trini Alvarado|Jay Mohr|Buddy Hackett|Hallie Eisenberg|Matt Craven|Bill Cobbs|Tia Texada|Laura Harrington|Peter Basch|Emily Mura-Smith|Hal Robinson|Tamara Zook|Nicole Chamberlain|Charles Parks|Seth Mumy|Dig Wayne|Michael Leydon Campbell|Kristie Transeau|Francesca Federico-O'Murchu|Jerry Winsett|Bud Cox|Miguel Ángel Arechiga|Adalberto Yáñez|Oscar Flores|Jose Luna|Marcelo Berestovoy|Josh Cruze|Yussi Wenger|Larry G. Goldman|Martin Flores|Craig Hosking|William A. Baker
title: Paulie, el loro bocazas
